Title: Basic Training
description: This package includes 1 basic game which you will play and I will guide you. I will show you, your mistakes, and how to improve them.

Title: Intermediate Training
description: This package includes 2 intermediate game which you will play and I will guide you. I will show you, your mistakes, and how to improve them.

Title: Advanced Training
description: This Exclusive package includes 4 to 5 advanced game which you will play with me and I will guide you. I will show you, your mistakes, and how to improve them.Also in this package you will get a rank push (maximum 4 match rank) where I will play from your account and push your rank, and give you some tips and tricks as well
